upload_request_full_short.subject: IEEE VIS 2024 Upload Request (Test)
upload_request_full_short.body_text:
Dear {Contributor(s)},

Congratulations once again on the acceptance to VIS 2024 of your paper with the unique submission ID {UID}, entitled “{Title}”.
As per the instructions you received in the final acceptance email, the final camera ready papers and supplemental materials are to be uploaded via the PCS submission system by August 8.  
We also kindly remind you that the early registration period for IEEE VIS 2024 lasts until September 1. All papers are required to have one author register as a speaker, irrespective of whether they plan to presented in person or virtually, and must be presented by that person.: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/registration/conference-registration

This email contains instructions concerning the upload of additional submission items required (video preview and representative image). Two points that require your action are listed below, please read carefully and follow the links to finalize your submission. Detailed information and instructions regarding the preparation of all items listed are available here: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/final-information-paper-authors.
Please use the following link to upload the requested material via our Presentation Material Upload system:

{PMU Upload Link}

1. Video Preview. Please upload your mandatory 25-second video preview and subtitle file via the provided Upload link. The link is specific for material relating to your presentation with submission ID {UID}. Instructions regarding the creation of the video preview are available here: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/fast-forward-and-video-previews
2. Representative Image. As described in the talk recording guide https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/talk-guide#required-material, it is also required for authors to submit a representative image, with a brief caption, for use as an icon on the conference web pages. 
The deadline for the video preview and representative image is August 22.

After uploading a file, we perform various initial checks automatically. If any errors are reported, you must fix the raised issues before the respective deadline. We also encourage you to strongly consider any warnings that might be displayed.
Please carefully go through and complete the list of tasks by the above given deadlines. All deadlines are at 11:59pm (23:59) Anywhere on Earth (AoE). If you have any questions don’t hesitate to contact the tech chairs at tech@ieeevis.org.
 
Best regards,
IEEE VIS 2024 Tech Chairs
Aditeya Pandey, John Thompson, Harry Li, Kelvin Li
upload_request_full_short.body_html:
IEEE VIS 2024 Upload Request (Test)

https://ieeevis.org/

Dear {Contributor(s)},

Congratulations once again on the acceptance to VIS 2024 of your paper with the unique submission ID {UID}, entitled “{Title}”.

As per the instructions you received in the final acceptance email, the final camera ready papers and supplemental materials are to be uploaded via the PCS submission system by August 8.

We also kindly remind you that the early registration period for IEEE VIS 2024 lasts until September 1. All papers are required to have one author register as a speaker, irrespective of whether they plan to presented in person or virtually, and must be presented by that person: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/registration/conference-registration.

This email contains instructions concerning the upload of additional submission items required (video preview and representative image). Two points that require your action are listed below, please read carefully and follow the links to finalize your submission. Detailed information and instructions regarding the preparation of all items listed are available here: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/final-information-paper-authors

Please use the following link to upload the requested material via our Presentation Material Upload system:

{PMU Upload Link}

  1. Video Preview

    Please upload your mandatory 25-second video preview and subtitle file via the provided Upload link. The link is specific for material relating to your presentation with submission ID {UID}. Instructions regarding the creation of the video preview are available here: https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/fast-forward-and-video-previews.

  2. Representative Image

    As described in the talk recording guide (https://ieeevis.org/year/2024/info/presenter-information/talk-guide), it is also required for authors to submit a representative image, with a brief caption, for use as an icon on the conference web pages.

The deadline for the video preview and representative image is August 22.

After uploading a file, we perform various initial checks automatically. If any errors are reported, you must fix the raised issues before the respective deadline. We also encourage you to strongly consider any warnings that might be displayed.

Please carefully go through and complete the list of tasks by the above given deadlines. All deadlines are at 11:59pm (23:59) Anywhere on Earth (AoE). If you have any questions don’t hesitate to contact the tech chairs at tech@ieeevis.org.

Best regards,

IEEE VIS 2024 Tech Chairs

Aditeya Pandey, John Thompson, Harry Li, and Kelvin Li
